mutants.code:
import re

def check_mutual_palindromes(s1, s2):
    s1 = re.sub('[\\W_]', '', s1.lower())
    s2 = re.sub('[\\W_]', '', s2.lower())
    return s1 == s1[::-1] or s2 == s2[::-1]

import re

def check_mutual_palindromes(s1, s2):
    s1 = re.sub('', '', s1.lower())
    s2 = re.sub('[\\W_]', '', s2.lower())
    return s1 == s1[::-1] and s2 == s2[::-1]

import re

def check_mutual_palindromes(s1, s2):
    s1 = re.sub('[\\W_]', 'MUTATED', s1.lower())
    s2 = re.sub('[\\W_]', '', s2.lower())
    return s1 == s1[::-1] and s2 == s2[::-1]

def check_mutual_palindromes(s1, s2):

import re

def check_mutual_palindromes(s1, s2):
    s1 = re.sub('[\\W_]', '', s1.lower())
    s2 = re.sub('[\\W_]', '', s2.lower())
    return s1 != s1[::-1] and s2 == s2[::-1]

import re

def check_mutual_palindromes(s1, s2):
    s1 = re.sub('[\\W_]', '', s1.lower())
    s2 = re.sub('[\\W_]', '', s2.lower())
    return s1 == s1[::-1] and s2 != s2[::-1]

    return s1 == s1[::+1] and s2 == s2[::-1]

def check_mutual_palindromes(s1, s2):
    s1 = re.sub('[\\W_]', '', s1.lower())

import re

def check_mutual_palindromes(s1, s2):
    s1 = re.sub('[\\W_]', '', s1.lower())
